TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Donnie_Boyce, title = Donnie_Boyce, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Donnie_Boyce} }

S.FORM: Donnie Boyce nalecuhan i Chicago, Illinois, nanu syubay kanas-mali miunduay nu Amilika NBA nisakaput, pahanhanan tu kawaw ayza. Donnie Boyce i 1995 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ku uwac atu silsil 42, namapili' tu nu Atlanta Hawks putiput. 9 bulad 2 demiad, 1973 a mihca, Donnie Boyce, miunduay.

Donnie Boyce nalecohan i Chicago, Illinois, nano syobay kanas-mali miondoay no Amilika NBA nisakapot, pahanhanan to kawaw ayza. Donnie Boyce i 1995 a mihcan NBA sapapili' mimaliay a kawaw, saka 2 ko owac ato silsil 42, namapili' to no Atlanta Hawks potipot. 9 bolad 2 demiad, 1973 a mihca, Donnie Boyce, miondoay.
